body:
On 2011-08-09 08:47:47 -0700, Greg Ward said:


> If you aren't generating an image, but are (as you say) just sending a 
> small number of rays, just run your calculation twice, saving the 
> results to an ambient file.  Should be very quick the second time 
> through.


Ohhh... Thanks--I'll try that.




Randolph
